Model Year.description: The year that the car model was released

Engine Size(L).description: The size of the car engine in liters

Cylinders.description: The number of cylinders in the car engine

Transmission.description: The type of transmission in the car

Fuel Type.description: The type of fuel the car uses

Fuel Consumption (City (L/100 km).description: The fuel consumption in the city measured in liters per 100 kilometers

Fuel Consumption(Hwy (L/100 km)).description: The fuel consumption on the highway measured in liters per 100 kilometers

Fuel Consumption(Comb (L/100 km)).description: The combined fuel consumption measured in liters per 100 kilometers

Fuel Consumption(Comb (mpg)).description: The combined fuel consumption measured in miles per gallon

CO2 Emissions(g/km).description: The CO2 emission of the car measured in grams per kilometer

CO2 Rating.description: The CO2 rating of the car

Smog Rating.description: The smog rating of the car
